title: Bomb threat: plan, don't panic
creator_credit: William Brose Productions and William Brose
brief_description: Bomb threats, once almost unknown, have dramatically increased in number. The best defence is a plan carefully evolved to fit your organisation. This film is designed for all levels of management and employees. The film is open-ended to promote audience involvement and discussion.
